name: Nothing, I Know: "Face of Fear"
description:
preorder the new five track EP from these Italian thrashy metalcore mobsters!

Comes with free stickers and some other stuff!

For fans of Terror, Snapcase, Cro-Mags & early Caliban


Price includes UK postage & packing.

name: Santa Karla: "A Thousand Deaths"
description:
6 tracks of crushing old school metalcore with a refreshingly modern twist from Kent's Santa Karla.

For fans of Integrity, Throwdown, Zao & Dead Swans.

UK Postage & Packing included in the price.


6/10 
- Rocksound

"One of the UK's better kept secrets, and one that certainly deserves to be discovered" 

7.5/10 (excellent) 
- Terrorizer

"This CD rages from start to finish and is definitely worthy of many return visits...  Track by track this EP is a solid, uncompromising listen. Do you miss the days when Throwdown used to be good? You know what to doâ€¦"

9/10
- www.dieshellsuit.co.uk

"Santa Karla have delivered a crushingly effective blast of metallic hardcore that's every bit as good, if not better, than anything else I've heard in the genre this year." 

- A Short Fanzine About Rocking

"It's tough to find fault in this first of no doubt many awesome recordings from kent-born metallic hardcore bruisers, santa karla. Amid the impossibly addictive fast-paced onslaughts come moments of gothic fretwork and omnimous whisperings that allow for a breathless refuel, but even then these boys leave you anxiously looking behind wary of the next attack." 

- Metal Hammer

name: Safety Records patches (One of each!)
description: Price is for one of each colour patch and UK postage!
